summary: Build a Type 1 Web Application Testing Platform where users paste a website URL to auto-generate test cases, bug lists, and corner cases, with an additional manual editing section to add/modify test cases and results.
known_issues: Build/implementation attempts are failing with messages like 'AI struggled' / 'couldn't implement that request' / 'build didnâ€™t complete' when generating the platform.

existing_features.title: Add a new "Web App Testing" generator flow where a user can paste a website URL, click "Generate", and receive (a) generated test cases, (b) a generated bug list, and (c) generated corner/edge cases for that target website.

Add an "Auto + Manual" workflow: after generation, allow users to review and manually add/edit/delete test cases and bugs within the app UI, starting from the generated baseline for a given target website.
Integrate the generator into the existing navigation and routing so users can easily access it, and connect existing Test Cases / Bugs areas to the selected target website context.

new_feature_requests.summary: Type 1 Web Application Testing Platform: paste a website link to auto-generate test cases, bug list, corner cases, and functionality coverage
Add 'Auto + Manual' workflow: after generating from URL, allow users to manually add/edit test cases and results
Provide a clear UI for pasting a website URL and triggering generation (input box + Generate action)
Implement backend data models and persistence for "target websites" and their generated artifacts so each user can generate and revisit results for multiple URLs over time.

Implement deterministic, template-based generation logic that produces a reasonable baseline set of test cases, bug suggestions, and corner cases from a URL, without attempting to crawl or fetch the target website content.

projectName: Add URL-based test plan generator with Auto + Manual workflow
